languages.text: "...инструментальные терминалы уже заменены, а системы подачи материалов готовятся к божественному преображению. Выполнение Новой Процедуры задержано, ибо в наших рядах есть те, кто сомневается в словах {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензора{/g} и приближенных его. Есть и те, кто не подвластен Протоколу Улучшения, что приводит техносоратников к прозрению, да будут милосердны к ним отправители судеб. Недеяние — смерть, и я должен вернуться к нашему великому труду. Слава Истине, что откроет путь к Знанию, сокрытому во тьме..."

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Лог о том что завод начали переделывать. получаем намеки на то, что завод мог закорраптиться

languages.text: "...the instrumental terminals have already been replaced, and the material delivery systems are being prepared for divine transformation. The execution of the New Procedure has been delayed, for there are some in our ranks who doubt the words of the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} and his votaries. And there are some who are not susceptible to the Enhancement Protocol that carries our tech-comrades to enlightenment — may the deliverers of fate be merciful to them. Inaction is death, and I must be returning to our great work. Praise be to the Truth that will reveal the path to the Knowledge shrouded in darkness..."
languages.original_text: "...инструментальные терминалы уже заменены, а системы подачи материалов готовятся к божественному преображению. languages.text: “......仪器终端已经替换，材料输送系统正在准备进行神圣改造。新程序的执行推迟了，因为我们之中有人怀疑{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}与他的信徒的话语。此外，我们之中还有一部分人，不愿意接受会为我们的技术同伴带来启迪的增强协议，愿命运的拯救者仁慈对待他们。碌碌无为就等同于死亡，我必须返回我们伟大的工作之中。赞美真理，愿它揭示我们的道路，让我们看到笼罩在黑暗之中的知识……”
languages.original_text: "...the instrumental terminals have already been replaced, and the material delivery systems are being prepared for divine transformation. The execution of the New Procedure has been delayed, for there are some in our ranks who doubt the words of the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} and his votaries. And there are some who are not susceptible to the Enhancement Protocol that carries our tech-comrades to enlightenment — may the deliverers of fate be merciful to them. Inaction is death, and I must be returning to our great work. Praise be to the Truth that will reveal the path to the Knowledge shrouded in darkness..."

traits.locale_text: “......仪器终端已经替换，材料输送系统正在准备进行神圣改造。新程序的执行推迟了，因为我们之中有人怀疑{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}与他的信徒的话语。此外，我们之中还有一部分人，不愿意接受会为我们的技术同伴带来启迪的增强协议，愿命运的拯救者仁慈对待他们。碌碌无为就等同于死亡，我必须返回我们伟大的工作之中。赞美真理，愿它揭示我们的道路，让我们看到笼罩在黑暗之中的知识……”

languages.text: «... las terminales instrumentales ya han sido reemplazadas, y se están preparando los sistemas de envío de materiales para la transformación divina. Se ha retrasado la ejecución del Nuevo Proceso, ya que hay algunos individuos entre nuestras filas que dudan de las palabras del {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g} y sus fieles. Y hay ciertas personas que no son susceptibles al Protocolo de Mejora que lleva a nuestros tecnocamaradas a la iluminación... Que los portadores del destino se apiaden de ellos. La inacción es igual a la muerte, y yo debo regresar a nuestro gran trabajo. Alabada sea la Verdad que revelará el camino hacia el Conocimiento, envuelto en oscuridad...».
languages.original_text: "...the instrumental terminals have already been replaced, and the material delivery systems are being prepared for divine transformation. The execution of the New Procedure has been delayed, for there are some in our ranks who doubt the words of the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} and his votaries. And there are some who are not susceptible to the Enhancement Protocol that carries our tech-comrades to enlightenment — may the deliverers of fate be merciful to them. Inaction is death, and I must be returning to our great work. Praise be to the Truth that will reveal the path to the Knowledge shrouded in darkness..."

La inacción es igual a la muerte, y yo debo regresar a nuestro gran trabajo. Alabada sea la Verdad que revelará el camino hacia el Conocimiento, envuelto en oscuridad...».

languages.text: 「…有用な端末はすでに取り替え済みで、材料配達システムを聖なる変身に備えて準備した。{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}やその信者の言葉を疑う仲間のせいで、新手順の実行が遅れている。技術同胞達を開眼させる強化プロトコルに抵抗がある者達まで現れる事態だ…運命の解放者よ、我らにどうかご慈悲を。何もしないのは死も同然。偉大なる任務に戻らなければ。暗闇に包まれた知識への道を開く真実を讃えよ…」
languages.original_text: "...the instrumental terminals have already been replaced, and the material delivery systems are being prepared for divine transformation. The execution of the New Procedure has been delayed, for there are some in our ranks who doubt the words of the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} and his votaries. And there are some who are not susceptible to the Enhancement Protocol that carries our tech-comrades to enlightenment — may the deliverers of fate be merciful to them. Inaction is death, and I must be returning to our great work. Praise be to the Truth that will reveal the path to the Knowledge shrouded in darkness..."

traits.locale_text: 「…有用な端末はすでに取り替え済みで、材料配達システムを聖なる変身に備えて準備した。{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}やその信者の言葉を疑う仲間のせいで、新手順の実行が遅れている。技術同胞達を開眼させる強化プロトコルに抵抗がある者達まで現れる事態だ…運命の解放者よ、我らにどうかご慈悲を。何もしないのは死も同然。偉大なる任務に戻らなければ。暗闇に包まれた知識への道を開く真実を讃えよ…」

languages.text: "... die relevanten Terminals wurden bereits ersetzt, und die Materialliefersysteme werden für die göttliche Verwandlung vorbereitet. Die Ausführung der neuen Prozesse hat sich verzögert, denn es gib in unseren Reihen welche, die die Worte des {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensors{/g} und seiner Anhänger anzweifeln. Und dann sind da diejenigen, die für das Verbesserungsprotokoll, das unsere Tech-Kameraden zur Erleuchtung führt, nicht empfänglich sind – mögen die Boten des Schicksals gnädig mit ihnen sein. Tatenlosigkeit ist Tod, und ich muss zu unserer großen Arbeit zurückkehren. Gepriesen sei die Wahrheit, denn sie enthüllt den Pfad zu dem in Dunkelheit gehüllten Wissen ..."
languages.original_text: "...the instrumental terminals have already been replaced, and the material delivery systems are being prepared for divine transformation. The execution of the New Procedure has been delayed, for there are some in our ranks who doubt the words of the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} and his votaries. And there are some who are not susceptible to the Enhancement Protocol that carries our tech-comrades to enlightenment — may the deliverers of fate be merciful to them. Inaction is death, and I must be returning to our great work. Praise be to the Truth that will reveal the path to the Knowledge shrouded in darkness..."

languages.text: « ... les terminaux de contrôle ont déjà été remplacés et les systèmes d'acheminement des matériaux sont en cours de préparation pour leur transformation divine. La mise en œuvre de la Nouvelle Procédure a cependant été retardée, car certains d'entre-nous se méfient des dires du {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} et de ses disciples. Et d'autres ne sont pas réceptifs au Protocole d'Amélioration devant mener nos technoconfrères à l'illumination... Puissent les exécuteurs du destin avoir pitié d'eux. Et puisque l'inaction, c'est la mort, il me faut maintenant retourner à notre grand œuvre. Louée soit la Vérité qui illuminera la voie vers la connaissance et dissipera les ténèbres qui l'occultent... »
languages.original_text: "...the instrumental terminals have already been replaced, and the material delivery systems are being prepared for divine transformation. The execution of the New Procedure has been delayed, for there are some in our ranks who doubt the words of the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} and his votaries. And there are some who are not susceptible to the Enhancement Protocol that carries our tech-comrades to enlightenment — may the deliverers of fate be merciful to them. Inaction is death, and I must be returning to our great work. Praise be to the Truth that will reveal the path to the Knowledge shrouded in darkness..."

Louée soit la Vérité qui illuminera la voie vers la connaissance et dissipera les ténèbres qui l'occultent... »

languages.text: "Yardımcı terminaller çoktan değiştirildi, malzeme dağıtım sistemleri ise ilahi dönüşüme hazırlanıyor. saflarımızda {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör{/g} ile taraftarlarının sözlerinden şüphe duyanlar olduğundan Yeni Prosedür'ün infazı ertelendi. Tekno yoldaşlarımızı aydınlanmaya taşıyan Geliştirme Protokolü'ne duyarlı olmayanlar da cabası. Kaderlerini tayin edecekler merhametli olsun. Eylemsizlik ölümdür, yüce işimize geri dönüyorum. İrfana giden karanlığa bürünmüş yolu ortaya çıkaracak Hakikat'e hamdolsun..."
languages.original_text: "...the instrumental terminals have already been replaced, and the material delivery systems are being prepared for divine transformation. The execution of the New Procedure has been delayed, for there are some in our ranks who doubt the words of the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} and his votaries. And there are some who are not susceptible to the Enhancement Protocol that carries our tech-comrades to enlightenment — may the deliverers of fate be merciful to them. Inaction is death, and I must be returning to our great work. Praise be to the Truth that will reveal the path to the Knowledge shrouded in darkness..."

traits.locale_text: "... yardımcı terminaller çoktan değiştirildi, malzeme dağıtım sistemleri ise ilahi dönüşüme hazırlanıyor. Yeni Prosedür'ün infazı ertelendi çünkü saflarımızda {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör{/g} ile taraftarlarının sözlerinden şüphe duyanlar var. Tekno yoldaşlarımızı aydınlanmaya taşıyan Geliştirme Protokolü'ne duyarlı olmayanlar da cabası, kaderlerini tayin edecekler merhametli olsun. Eylemsizlik ölümdür, yüce işimize geri dönüyorum. İrfana giden karanlığa bürünmüş yolu ortaya çıkaracak Hakikate hamdolsun…"
